Black holes are not actually black, this is because they do not let light escape, and by not emitting light, they take on the color of darkness.
On Saturn, one day is equivalent to 243 Earth days.
The mission of the Voyager probes was to explore the limits of the Solar System. Voyager 2 is currently 19.9 billion kilometers from Earth, more than three times the distance to Pluto.

Liquid water is one of the foundations for life. Depending on the distance between a planet and it\'s star, we can infer its temperatures and therefore whether it is possible for liquid water to exist.

Gravitational anomalies refer to variations in the Earth\'s gravitational field that indicate differences in the density of underground rocks. These anomalies allow geophysicists to identify geological structures such as sedimentary basins or mineralized zones.
